trans-unit.target: The @@prefix defines a custom ID for the translation. Using SNAKE_CASE is recommended for consistency.

trans-unit.source: XLIFF Translator has revolutionized our localization workflow. The context-aware translations are incredibly accurate.

trans-unit.source: Information about where and how the text is used in your application
trans-unit.target: Information about where and how the text is used in your application

trans-unit.source: A TransUnit is the fundamental building block of XLIFF files. It represents a single piece of text that needs to be translated, along with its metadata and context.
trans-unit.target: A TransUnit is the fundamental building block of XLIFF files. It represents a single piece of text that needs to be translated, along with its metadata and context.

trans-unit.source: The original text in your application's source language
trans-unit.target: The original text in your application's source language

trans-unit.source: The current status of the translation (initial, translated, reviewed, etc.)
trans-unit.target: The current status of the translation (initial, translated, reviewed, etc.)

trans-unit.source: The translated text in the target language
trans-unit.target: The translated text in the target language

trans-unit.target: Password must be at least 6 characters

trans-unit.target: Update the i18n configuration in angular.json:

trans-unit.target: We sent you a confirmation link

trans-unit.target: Your email has not been confirmed. Please check your inbox or request a new confirmation email.

trans-unit.target: An error occurred while verifying your email.

trans-unit.target: Please wait while we verify your email

trans-unit.source: Add configurations for each language in the build section:
trans-unit.target: Add configurations for each language in the build section:

trans-unit.source: Select a provider: Choose from GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket
trans-unit.target: Select a provider: Choose from GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket

trans-unit.source: Configure access: Create and provide the appropriate tokens
trans-unit.target: Configure access: Create and provide the appropriate tokens

trans-unit.source: Save your configuration: Enter your token and save the connection
trans-unit.target: Save your configuration: Enter your token and save the connection

trans-unit.source: Before running a translation, you can estimate the scope and complexity of the task:
trans-unit.target: Before running a translation, you can estimate the scope and complexity of the task:

trans-unit.source: The exact number of translation units that need processing
trans-unit.target: The exact number of translation units that need processing

trans-unit.source: How many credits will be required (1 translation unit = 1 credit)
trans-unit.target: How many credits will be required (1 translation unit = 1 credit)

trans-unit.source: Approximate time required (each translation unit takes 10-20 seconds to process)
trans-unit.target: Approximate time required (each translation unit takes 10-20 seconds to process)

trans-unit.source: Important: Large translation projects with hundreds of translation units can take significant time. Plan accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Important: Large translation projects with hundreds of translation units can take significant time. Plan accordingly.

trans-unit.source: The estimation process helps you understand:
trans-unit.target: The estimation process helps you understand:

trans-unit.source: Select the repository you want to work with
trans-unit.target: Select the repository you want to work with

trans-unit.source: Click on "Estimate" to analyze your XLIFF files
trans-unit.target: Click on "Estimate" to analyze your XLIFF files

trans-unit.source: Configure the estimate options:Branch: Select the branch containing your XLIFF filesFile Pattern: By default "xlf" to search all XLIFF files. Use specific patterns like "ru.xlf" to target only Russian filesTranslation State: Choose which translation units to include (default is "new" to focus on untranslated content)
trans-unit.target: Configure the estimate options:Branch: Select the branch containing your XLIFF filesFile Pattern: By default "xlf" to search all XLIFF files. Use specific patterns like "ru.xlf" to target only Russian filesTranslation State: Choose which translation units to include (default is "new" to focus on untranslated content)

trans-unit.source: Review the estimate results showing the number of translation units to process
trans-unit.target: Review the estimate results showing the number of translation units to process

trans-unit.source: Then replace the standard extract-i18n configuration with ng-extract-i18n-merge:
trans-unit.target: Then replace the standard extract-i18n configuration with ng-extract-i18n-merge:

trans-unit.source: buildTarget: Your application's build target name
trans-unit.target: buildTarget: Your application's build target name

trans-unit.source: outputPath: Directory where translation files will be stored
trans-unit.target: outputPath: Directory where translation files will be stored

trans-unit.source: includeContext: Includes source file information in the XLIFF files
trans-unit.target: includeContext: Includes source file information in the XLIFF files

trans-unit.source: resetTranslationState: Marks all translations as needing review on changes
trans-unit.target: resetTranslationState: Marks all translations as needing review on changes

trans-unit.source: targetFiles: List of translation files to generate/update
trans-unit.target: targetFiles: List of translation files to generate/update

trans-unit.source: Automatically extracts translatable strings from your application
trans-unit.target: Automatically extracts translatable strings from your application

trans-unit.source: Merges new translations with existing ones in a single step
trans-unit.target: Merges new translations with existing ones in a single step

trans-unit.target: For managing translation files, we'll use ng-extract-i18n-merge which simplifies the process of extracting and merging translations:

trans-unit.source: Identifies XLIFF files matching your pattern
trans-unit.target: Identifies XLIFF files matching your pattern

trans-unit.source: Analyzes each translation unit and its context in the source code
trans-unit.target: Analyzes each translation unit and its context in the source code

trans-unit.source: Sends translation instructions to the AI engine with relevant context
trans-unit.target: Sends translation instructions to the AI engine with relevant context

trans-unit.source: Updates the XLIFF files with the translations
trans-unit.target: Updates the XLIFF files with the translations

trans-unit.source: Creates a pull request with the changes (if configured)
trans-unit.target: Creates a pull request with the changes (if configured)

trans-unit.source: After connecting to a Git provider:
trans-unit.target: After connecting to a Git provider:

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the provider's page where your repositories are listed
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the provider's page where your repositories are listed

trans-unit.source: Browse and select the repository containing your Angular project with XLIFF files
trans-unit.target: Browse and select the repository containing your Angular project with XLIFF files

trans-unit.source: Specify the branch to work with (default is usually the main branch)
trans-unit.target: Specify the branch to work with (default is usually the main branch)

trans-unit.source: Learn about advanced i18n features like pluralization and selection.
trans-unit.target: Learn about advanced i18n features like pluralization and selection.

trans-unit.source: Official tool for extracting and merging i18n translations in a single step.
trans-unit.target: Official tool for extracting and merging i18n translations in a single step.

trans-unit.source: This workflow allows you to keep translations in your version control system and follow standard code review practices for translation updates.
trans-unit.target: This workflow allows you to keep translations in your version control system and follow standard code review practices for translation updates.

trans-unit.source: Review the created pull request in your Git provider
trans-unit.target: Review the created pull request in your Git provider

trans-unit.source: Check the translated content for accuracy
trans-unit.target: Check the translated content for accuracy

trans-unit.source: Make any necessary adjustments directly in the XLIFF files
trans-unit.target: Make any necessary adjustments directly in the XLIFF files

trans-unit.source: Merge the pull request to update your main codebase with the translations
trans-unit.target: Merge the pull request to update your main codebase with the translations

trans-unit.source: Learn more about how to prepare your application for translation.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about how to prepare your application for translation.

trans-unit.source: Create a dedicated branch for translations to keep them separate from feature development
trans-unit.target: Create a dedicated branch for translations to keep them separate from feature development

trans-unit.source: Ensure your source code has clear context for translation units to improve AI translation quality
trans-unit.target: Ensure your source code has clear context for translation units to improve AI translation quality

trans-unit.source: Use specific file patterns to target translations for one language at a time
trans-unit.target: Use specific file patterns to target translations for one language at a time

trans-unit.source: Run translations regularly as you develop to avoid large batches of untranslated content
trans-unit.target: Run translations regularly as you develop to avoid large batches of untranslated content

trans-unit.source: Always review AI-generated translations, especially for critical user-facing content
trans-unit.target: Always review AI-generated translations, especially for critical user-facing content

trans-unit.source: Running an AI-powered translation is a separate process from estimation:
trans-unit.target: Running an AI-powered translation is a separate process from estimation:

trans-unit.source: Select the repository containing your XLIFF files
trans-unit.target: Select the repository containing your XLIFF files

trans-unit.source: Click on "Translate" to begin the process
trans-unit.target: Click on "Translate" to begin the process

trans-unit.source: Configure the translation options:Branch: Select the source branchFile Pattern: Specify which XLIFF files to translateTranslation State: Select which translation units to process (e.g., "new", "needs-translation")Target State: Define the state to set for translated units (e.g., "translated", "final")
trans-unit.target: Configure the translation options:Branch: Select the source branchFile Pattern: Specify which XLIFF files to translateTranslation State: Select which translation units to process (e.g., "new", "needs-translation")Target State: Define the state to set for translated units (e.g., "translated", "final")

trans-unit.source: During the translation process, XLIFF Translator:
trans-unit.target: During the translation process, XLIFF Translator:

trans-unit.source: This simplified workflow ensures your translation files are always up-to-date with source content, making the internationalization process more efficient and error-free.
trans-unit.target: This simplified workflow ensures your translation files are always up-to-date with source content, making the internationalization process more efficient and error-free.

trans-unit.source: Create an App Password with repository:read and repository:write permissions.
trans-unit.target: Create an App Password with repository:read and repository:write permissions.

trans-unit.source: To connect, generate a Personal Access Token with the following scopes:
trans-unit.target: To connect, generate a Personal Access Token with the following scopes:

trans-unit.source: Get your token here: Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens > Tokens (classic) > Generate new token
trans-unit.target: Get your token here: Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens > Tokens (classic) > Generate new token

trans-unit.source: Create a Personal Access Token with api, read_repository, and write_repository scopes.
trans-unit.target: Create a Personal Access Token with api, read_repository, and write_repository scopes.

trans-unit.source: Before using XLIFF Translator, you need to configure your Angular application for internationalization.
trans-unit.target: Before using XLIFF Translator, you need to configure your Angular application for internationalization.

trans-unit.source: You'll be prompted with the translation options modal as shown earlier in the "Selecting Repositories" section.
trans-unit.target: You'll be prompted with the translation options modal as shown earlier in the "Selecting Repositories" section.
